General.Name: Zhejiang MustangBattery Co.Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang MustangBattery Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and sale of dry batteries in China. The company offers zinc and alkaline manganese, carbon, nickel hydrogen, and lithium batteries under the Mustang, MUSTANG, and RAYMAX brands. It also sells its products in the European Union, North America, and the Southeast Asia. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Ningbo, China.
